thread.title: Enter to Stream “Tons of Guns” This Week on American Airgunner
thread.title_full: Enter to Stream “Tons of Guns” This Week on American Airgunner

author: Justin Stakes
title: Enter to Stream “Tons of Guns” This Week on American Airgunner
text:
American Airgunner – Ep. 3 Giveaway American Airgunner 
Fort Smith, AR -( Ammoland.com )- The history of airguns and firearms in the United States is vast, much of it is housed in Fairfax, Virginia at the NRA Museum. 
Join host of American Airgunner TV Show, Rossi Morreale on a tour of 15,000 square feet of guns. See guns of old, not so old, used by famous people, and guns used in Hollywood in this episode called “Tons of Guns.” 
Plus, don’t miss Rossi shooting the new Walther Terrus, an Umarex air rifle that some regard as the best out-of-the-box pellet rifle in its class. As if that weren’t enough, our airgun experts talk about the amount of energy airguns produce during the American Airgunner Round Table. 
This week’s prize in the American Airgunner 2015 Season of Giveaways is the newest Roku3 streaming device. You can ENTER THIS WEEK’S GIVEAWAY on Facebook or at http://americanairgunner.com/airgun-giveaway and follow American Airgunner online for the remainder of this year for your chance to win weekly prizes! 
Audiences are invited to follow American Airgunner on Facebook, YouTube, AmericanAirgunner.com, Instagram and to search for #AirgunnerTV to keep up with the show, its host Rossi Morreale, and the show’s guests, airgun hunters, and experts. American Airgunner 2015 Season of Giveaways 
American Airgunner airs on Wednesdays at 4:30 pm Eastern, Fridays at 1:30 am and during primetime on Friday evening at 8:30 pm Eastern/5:30 pm Pacific. Pursuit Channel can be found on DirectTV Ch. 604, and DISH Network Ch. 393 and via Roku and Chromecast. Check your local listings for additional channel information.
